name: Tankex
description:
Soldier! All to your tanks! We must win this battle at all costs!

Tankex is a deathmatch game with tanks. A game can accommodate up to 8 players in 4 different teams. Compete against your friends or bots on the map.

Will you be able to dominate the battlefield?!



Features :

■ Choice between 3 tank skins!
■ 4 teams of 2 players!
■ A deathmatch map!
■ Multiplayer!
■ Bots !
■ Addictive!
